verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came again to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because your <S%H3820>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H1361>up,<s%> and you have <S%H559>said,<s%> I am a <S%H410>god,<s%> I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> yet you are <S%H120>man,<s%> and not <S%H410>God,<s%> though you <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>—
<S%H2450>behold,<s%> you are wiser than <S%H1840>Daniel;<s%> there is no <S%H5640>secret<s%> that is hidden from <S%H5640>you;<s%>

by your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and by your <S%H8394>understanding<s%> you have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> yourself <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> into your <S%H214>treasures;<s%>

by your <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and by your <S%H7404>traffic<s%> you have <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> because of your <S%H2428>riches<s%>—
therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because you have <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%>

<S%H935>therefore,<s%> behold, I will bring <S%H2114>strangers<s%> on <S%H6184>you,<s%> the terrible of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and they shall <S%H7324>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> against the <S%H3308>beauty<s%> of your <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and they shall <S%H2490>defile<s%> your <S%H3314>brightness.<s%>

They shall bring you <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit;<s%> and you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4463>death<s%> of those who are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

Will you <S%H559>yet<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him who <S%H2026>kills<s%> <S%H430>you,<s%> I am God? but you are <S%H120>man,<s%> and not <S%H410>God,<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him who wounds <S%H2490>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers:<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5002>it,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> over the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> You seal <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H8508>sum,<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H3632>perfect<s%> in <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

You were in <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> every <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H4540>adorned<s%> <S%H124>you:<s%> ruby, <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> <S%H3095>emerald,<s%> <S%H8658>chrysolite,<s%> <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> <S%H3471>jasper,<s%> <S%H5601>sapphire,<s%> <S%H5306>turquoise,<s%> and <S%H1304>beryl.<s%> <S%H2091>Gold<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H8596>tambourines<s%> and of <S%H5345>pipes<s%> was in <S%H3117>you.<s%> In the day that you were <S%H1254>created<s%> they were <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>

You were the <S%H4473>anointed<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> who <S%H5526>covers:<s%> and I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6944>you,<s%> so that you were on the holy <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> you have walked up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
You were <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H1254>created,<s%> until <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> was found in <S%H4672>you.<s%>

By the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of your <S%H7404>traffic<s%> they <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you with <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and you have <S%H2398>sinned:<s%> therefore I have cast you as <S%H2490>profane<s%> out of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and I have <S%H6>destroyed<s%> <S%H5526>you,<s%> covering <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Your <S%H3820>heart<s%> was lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> because of your <S%H3308>beauty;<s%> you have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> by reason <S%H5921>of<s%> your <S%H3314>brightness:<s%> I have <S%H7993>cast<s%> you to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> that they may see <S%H7200>you.<s%>

By the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> in the <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> of your <S%H7404>traffic,<s%> you have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuaries;<s%> therefore have I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H398>you;<s%> it has devoured <S%H5414>you,<s%> and I have turned you to <S%H665>ashes<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all those who see <S%H7200>you.<s%>

All those who <S%H3045>know<s%> you among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H1091>you:<s%> you have become a terror, and you <S%H369>shall<s%> nevermore have any <S%H5704>being.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and prophesy against <S%H5012>it,<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H6721>Behold,<s%> I am against you, Sidon; and I will be <S%H3513>glorified<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>you;<s%> and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I shall have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in <S%H6942>her,<s%> and shall be sanctified in her.

For I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> into <S%H1818>her,<s%> and blood into her <S%H2351>streets;<s%> and the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H2719>her,<s%> with the sword on her on every <S%H5439>side;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

There shall be no more a <S%H3992>pricking<s%> <S%H5544>brier<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> nor a <S%H3510>hurting<s%> <S%H6975>thorn<s%> of any that are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7590>them,<s%> that scorned <S%H3045>them;<s%> and they shall know that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> When I shall have <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> among whom they are <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> then shall they <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their own <S%H127>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

They shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> <S%H1129>therein;<s%> yes, they shall build <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> when I have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on all those who do them <S%H7590>despite<s%> all <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3045>them;<s%> and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>
